price: Nyinyi na baba zenu wa zamani?
footnotes: Nyinyi na baba zenu wa zamani - ati haya yanastahiki kuabudiwa au la? Lau mngeli zingatia mngeli jua kuwa hakika nyinyi mko katika upotovu ulio wazi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
